title: CH37 - Arm Chair
body:
Danish Designer, Hans J Wegner created the CH37 In 1962, a clean simple, aesthetically light in appearance, uncomplicated design that gives excellent comfort.
The chair is widely used for dining, conference halls, meeting and break out areas. Shaker-inspired, clean lines, natural paper reed cord, tightly woven seat, sturdy Ash frame, matt oiled to retain the smooth beauty of the natural wood.
